channel.title: How do i make npcs stronger?
channel.description:
NPCS STRONGER
Ok so I made some Dagg Kings and They are weak, only hittinh 1s and 2s.
I made black guards (lvl 49 or sumtin) and they hit 29s.
I tried the npc.cfg but it doesnt work.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 12:41:20 PM[/size][hr]Ok i found out that making the hp 0 makes them hit hard, if it's higher then they hit 1s, please help[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 01:04:26 PM[/size][hr]Someone HAS TO KNOW!

item.title: How do i make npcs stronger?
item.dc:creator: @jma0710 jma0710
item.description:
@jma0710 wrote:

You Can Not Chnage There Str Lvl But If You Make There Health Strong Then They Will Still Be A Bigger Opponent For Players Trust Me I Made The Heros On My Server Have 900Hp And They Almost Beat The Co-Owner Who Was Maxed Out At Level 250 Cb So Yea Just Changing The HP Will Make Them A Better Foe

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npcs stronger?
